testcase.name: Check login functionality of Expense tracker website - 1- Register New User Page.
testcase.system-out: Given - US - 007 - login credentials creation...............................passed When - I open the expense tracker app & the login page appears,which also has new user register link.passed Then - Clicking on the register link brings us to Register New User Page....passed

testcase.name: Check login functionality of Expense tracker website - 2- Register New User Page.
testcase.system-out: Given - US - 007 - login credentials creation-2.............................passed When - I open the expense tracker app - the login page appears first........passed Then - The First Page title that is displayed to the user is LOGIN..........passed
